features: ❥Simple and Practical: It can be used to wash baby clothes,underwear,socks,towels fruits vegetables and pet supplies,bring a more convenient and healthy life to you
❥Easy to Store: Small in size, does not take up too much space,it can be folded with just one touch,only 10 cm after folding,and can be stored in wardrobes,beds,sofas and washstands.
❥Safety Material: ABS and TPR materials,which are environmental and safety,and you can wash laundry with confidence.

❥Efficient Cleaning:Pulsator rotation,35w high power,high frequency washing,strong stain removal,110-220V,low power consumption,low noise,2.8L washing volume,Washing and dryer 2 in 1,touch screen three-mode control,easy to operate .

❥Applicable Occasions: Our portable washing machine can not only be used at home,but also suitable for apartments,student dormitories,RV,travel,etc.One-click storage can be easily put into the suitcase, saving you a lot of trouble
body.description: How To Use: 1.Put the clothes to be washed into the washing machine, add water 2.Select 10 minutes, long press the start button for 2-3 seconds, the washing machine starts to work 3.After washing, put it in the lower drain basket and choose to dehydrate for 5 minutes at regular intervals Notice: 1.The mini washing machine is suitable for small pieces of clothing. Too much clothing cannot be driven by the power of the washing machine. 2.When the washing machine is rotating, do not touch the inside to avoid accidents. 3.The drain basket of our mini washer keeps your items drip-free and avoids hand twisting, but doesn't dry your laundry completely. Product Information: Voltage: 110V-220V Unfolded size: 20.5*20.5*26cm Folded size: 20.5*20.5*11cm Weight: 2kg Power:36w Capacity: 2.8L Working method: pulsator Color:blue Features: portable and foldable,easy to wash personal small clothes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, messy, and wouldn't turn on/off-arrived defective
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointing. This little washing machine arrived defective or broken (or just poorly made, altogether). The On/Off button didn't work, and there were no English instructions, so I tried many things to get it to work. I finally pushed just above the button and could sometimes get it to turn on, but it was hit and miss, and changing time settings also only worked now and then. So much effort to just get it on and running! When I did get it running, I put a couple small washcloths in it and thought it was going to tip over-- very unstable, and the cheap plastic was bulging where the 2 cloths were turning around inside. The spin basket threw water everywhere and the lid doesn't fit on tightly. I'm usually very "forgiving" and do my best to make a product work for me, to support small businesses, and so I don't have to go to the trouble to return it, but I just couldn't keep this. It worked so poorly. I'm returning it today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This machine doesn’t work as advertised. It collapses during operation; doesn’t stay erect. I had a 3 pair of size small panties in it during operation. The lid doesn’t stay in place. It flings the water everywhere. It doesn’t clean the clothing articles. And, when it is collapsed it is far too bulky to pack in a suitcase for travel. As a frequent flier I would never take it with me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sloppy and very small
reviews.reviewText: Bought to wash/rinse intimates. 2 pieces went in and water splashed out. I reduced the water level then wasnt room for 2 pieces to wash. ALL instructions and buttons are in foreign language.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to put together
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Comes normal until you have to put together the drain basket and it's a pain in the but. Sat there for 40 minutes putting it together. Also the drain plug is very difficult to put in, overall good product washes clothes pretty nicely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: If you're thinking about buying this I'll do you a favor and tell you right now you may as well put that money in the garbage can for all the good this thing will do.Doesn't work at all even on small things like five pairs of no show socks. Makes such a horrible mess too, detergent water everywhere. And it's obnoxiously loud. I'm going to put mine where the creator should have put the idea for this thing to begin with: in the garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works, the mini basket inside for the spin cycle is definitely mini! But you can at least wash socks, washcloths, and underwear with this! Will work well for what it does! Buttons are a bit of a pain as they aren’t sensitive enough tho!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Total piece of junk
reviews.reviewText: First, no assembly instructions in English. The parts are very low grade plastic. Even with water only half full it spilled and leaked water all over. Little motor sounded very strained and I expect it would not last long. This product is a joke and Amazon should be ashamed to sell such garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT WORTH IT!
reviews.reviewText: Its very easy to use, light weight but not that effective. The spin dry is a waste of time. The buttons have to be pressed repeatedly to start. I wasntpleaseessapointing
